_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Keys with _else are produced with non-trained Stanford NLP and as such only includes capitalized words. The + designates a segment range. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np17:1.13^speaker: monks from the group of six
pli-tv-bu-vb-np17:1.15^speaker: monks from the group of six
pli-tv-bu-vb-np17:1.19^where_before_or_a: Banyan Tree Monastery at Kapilavatthu in the Sakyan country
pli-tv-bu-vb-np17:2.16^where_before_or_a: Sakyan country in the Banyan Tree Monastery at Kapilavatthu
pli-tv-bu-vb-np17^where: Banyan Tree Monastery at Kapilavatthu in the Sakyan country
